title: (调查)想要Bukkit上什么额外的Event么？
author: coderzeng
txt_content: 如题，最近在写个前置插件，提供一些额外event，有脑洞就好，来吧～

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content: 玩家用E打开背包的事件(手动斜眼笑)

replies.author: coderzeng
replies.txt_content:
810587921 发表于 2016-9-6 22:56
玩家用E打开背包的事件(手动斜眼笑)
= = 你故意的

replies.author: coderzeng
replies.txt_content:
810587921 发表于 2016-9-6 22:56
玩家用E打开背包的事件(手动斜眼笑)
你要的PlayerKeyPressEvent搞定了 = =，客户端要加Mod或者前置或者启动器

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: asdfg25855
replies.txt_content: 自写一个ticker监听单个实体移动，简称EntityMoveEvent

replies.author: RE_OVO
replies.txt_content:
PlayerCheatFlyEvent  作弊飞行
PlayerKillauraEvent 杀戮光环

replies.author: sakurayang
replies.txt_content:
翼LOVE·小爱 发表于 2016-9-10 14:37
左键探测0-0
玩家在领地内可自定Script Block，简单来说就是有权限的Script Block，再通俗一点就是ess + Script Block
